Method Detail

limitMemory

void limitMemory(long maxNumberRestaurants)
Limits the number of restaurants the HPYP is allowed to instantiate. Memory is limited by creating a dependent HPYP through deletion. Deletion occurs uniformly at random over the leaf nodes.

Parameters:
maxNumberRestaurants - max allowable number of instantiated restaurants in the model

continueSequence

double continueSequence(int observation)
Appends the observation to the sequence and adds the observation to the model. Observations are restricted to the interval [0,alphabetSize).

Parameters:
observation - integer value of observation
Returns:
the log probability of the observation in the predictive distribution prior to continuation / insertion

continueSequenceCdf

double[] continueSequenceCdf(int observation)
Appends the observation to the sequence and adds the observation to the model. Observations are restricted to the interval [0,alphabetSize). This is the method needed for compression.

Parameters:
observation - integer value of observation
Returns:
predictive cdf given the context of the observation

continueSequencePointOnCdf

Pair<MutableInteger,double[]> continueSequencePointOnCdf(double pointOnCdf)
Finds the observation on the predictive cdf given the current context and seats the observation. This is the method needed for decompression.

Parameters:
pointOnCdf - point on cdf
Returns:
Pair containing type of observation seated and predictive cdf

continueSequence

double continueSequence(int[] observations)
Appends an array of observations to the observed sequence in order.

Parameters:
observations - observations to append
Returns:
the summed log probability of all observations prior to continuation / insertion of each

generate

int[] generate(Sequence context,
               int numSamples)
Generates iid draws from the predictive distribution given the context.

Parameters:
context - array of integers specifying context
numSamples - number of iid draws
Returns:
integer array of samples from context

generateSequence

int[] generateSequence(Sequence initialContext,
                       int sequenceLength)
Generates independent draws from a sequence of predictive distributions indexed by the contexts that arise during sequential generation.

Parameters:
initialContext - context indexing initial predictive distribution
sequenceLength - number of draws made in sequence
Returns:
integer array of sequential samples

predictiveProbability

double[] predictiveProbability(Sequence context)
Gets the predictive CDF over the entire alphabet in a given context.

Parameters:
context - predictive probability context
index - index of last element of context
Returns:
array of predictive values for tokens 0 - (alphabetSize - 1)

predictiveProbability

double predictiveProbability(Sequence context,
                             int token)
Gets the predictive probability of a token in a given context.

Parameters:
context - predictive probability context
index - index of last element of context
token - token to get predictive probability of
Returns:
array of predictive values ordered according to tokens

sequenceProbability

double sequenceProbability(Sequence initialContext,
                           int[] sequence)
Scores a sequence given that it starts after a certain context.

Parameters:
initialContext - context of sequence
index - index of last element of context
seqeunce - seqeunce of observations to score
Returns:
log predictive probability of observing seqeunce after context

sample

double sample(int numSweeps)
Do Gibbs sampling of the parameters of the model. Seating arrangements are sampled according to the exact conditional distributions while discount parameters are sampled using a Metropolis step with a normal jumping distribution. Independent flat priors are imposed on the individual discount parameters.

Parameters:
numSweeps - number of passes to make Gibbs sampling
Returns:
joint log likelihood of the data and model parameters

score

double score()
Get the joint log likelihood of the data and model parameters.

Returns:
joint log likelihood of the data and model parameters

getParameters

ParametersAbstract getParameters()
Get paramters in a SMParameters object.

Returns:
values of parameters of the model in its current state
